content: men s knitted sweater with cables sizes 13/14 years to xxxl the piece is worked in drops merino extra fine pattern no me-124 yarn group b sizes 13/14 years - s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl materials drops merino extra fine from garnstudio 700-750-850-950-1000-1100-1200 g color 01 off white the piece can also be knitted with yarn from alternative yarn yarn group b drops double pointed needles and circular needle 80 cm/32 size 4 mm/us 6 or the size needed to get 21 stitches and 28 row stockinette stitch on 10 cm / 4 in width and 10 cm / 4 in height drops double pointed needles and circular needle 40 and 80 cm/16 and 32 size 3 5 mm/us 4 for rib or the size needed to get 22 stitches and 30 row stockinette stitch on 10 cm / 4 in width and 10 cm / 4 in height drops cable needle
